item.title: Participants Needed: Immersive Audiovisual Study at CRAIVE-Lab
item.description: Monday, November 10, 2025 12:00 AM - Wed , November 26, 2025 12:00 AM - RPI researchers are recruiting participants (18+ years old, normal hearing) for an immersive study at CRAIVE-Lab. You’ll experience five museum rooms at human scale with spatial audio and then answer a brief questionnaire. Sessions run November 10 — Nov 26; scheduling is flexible. Sign up with Milena Jonas Bem at jonasm@rpi.edu.

item.title: Information Security – Phishing Awareness during the Thanksgiving and Holiday Break
item.description:
Our Information Security team has observed a recurring trend during the holiday season: cybercriminals often target organizations and college campuses with phishing attacks. These emails may contain suspicious links, malicious attachments, or fraudulent websites designed to steal login credentials. Falling victim to such attacks can compromise your device or RCS account, potentially leading to data loss, system instability, and serious security vulnerabilities.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
